fields.label: Sections
fields.name: sections
fields.instructions: Sections are full width layouts of a page that can contain any number of inner components.

sub_fields.label: Section background image
sub_fields.name: section_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: It will cover the entire section. Recommended to upload in 1920x1080 resolution or higher

sub_fields.label: Section container top and bottom borders
sub_fields.name: section_container_top_and_bottom_borders

sub_fields.label: Components
sub_fields.name: components
sub_fields.instructions: Components are inner layouts that contain the actual content. Any number can be added in any order

sub_fields.label: Size of top and bottom margins
sub_fields.name: size_of_top_and_bottom_margins

sub_fields.label: Override all font colors in jumbo?
sub_fields.name: has_custom_font_color

sub_fields.label: Show text or buttons?
sub_fields.name: show_text_or_buttons
sub_fields.instructions: Buttons shown are wistia video launch button and book online demo button

sub_fields.label: Gravity forms ID
sub_fields.name: form_id
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the ID of your gravity form. Defaults to 2 which is newsletter form

sub_fields.label: Content panel image
sub_fields.name: content_panel_image
sub_fields.instructions: Image should be at least 690 pixels wide to avoid pixellation due to stretching.

sub_fields.label: CTA text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text is optional and can be left blank

sub_fields.label: Quote
sub_fields.name: quote_block_quote
sub_fields.instructions: Text is optional and can be left blank

sub_fields.label: Force boxes to be equal height?
sub_fields.name: force_equal_height
sub_fields.instructions: Browser support is IE10+ for this feature. Also this breaks some of the responsiveness of the boxes (all boxes will remain on the same row for larger than mobile view). Because of this it is not recommended to use it for more than 3 boxes in a row or the result is really thin boxes on smaller screens.

choices.constrained: Constrained (will most likely wrap to two lines)

sub_fields.label: Boxes
sub_fields.name: boxes
sub_fields.instructions: Minimum is 2 boxes up to a maximum of 4

layouts.name: blog_posts_in_content_boxes
layouts.label: Row of content boxes of latest news

sub_fields.label: Force boxes to be equal height?
sub_fields.name: force_equal_height
sub_fields.instructions: Browser support is IE10+ for this feature. Also this breaks some of the responsiveness of the boxes (all boxes will remain on the same row for larger than mobile view). Because of this it is not recommended to use it for more than 3 boxes in a row or the result is really thin boxes on smaller screens.

choices.constrained: Constrained (will most likely wrap to two lines)

sub_fields.label: Number of latest news items
sub_fields.name: number_of_news_items
sub_fields.instructions: Minimum is 2 news items to a maximum of 4

sub_fields.label: Custom clients display
sub_fields.message: This component currently has no configuration options and will simply showcase all Clients posts in a grid. To add a new client, go to Clients > Add New from Admin Menu.
